preparations.content: Place sunflower seeds in mixing bowl and chop <b>6 sec/speed 8<b>. Transfer to a bowl and set aside.
Place garlic, onion, red peppers, tomatoes, apples, oil, vinegar, salt, sugar and cayenne pepper in mixing bowl then chop <b>6 sec/speed 7<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.
Place simmering basket instead of measuring cup on lid of mixing bowl and cook <b>20 min/Varoma/speed 2<b>.
Add reserved chopped sunflower seeds and blend <b>10 sec/speed 4<b> <b>-8, increasing speed gradually<b>. Transfer to a bowl and leave to cool, then serve or refrigerate
